Resource allocation for Program / Project & Workspackages (Studies)

Register clinical trial with regulatory authorities
Planning of major milestones for studies
Based on objective of demographic study analysis and Marketing stratergies, determine the countries where Study need to be conducted
Initiate Document submissions to  Regulatory agencies
Monitor and adjust timelines as needed
Implement changes to protocols, amend protocol
Create risk-based monitoring plan, Implement monitoring activities
Create patient enrollment plan for each site
Create Site IDs and Subject IDs for capturing data
Plan Study drug availability batch and shipment as per dispensing milestones
Coordinate and track drug shipment. follow escalation channel
Vendor selection based on organizational norms
Vendor selection based on Regulatory compliance, Accreditation, Data integration capability with EDC platform, LIMS standards, Data integrity and security, cold chain logistics
Contarct sign off, Set data collection and data transfer expectations as per protocol through trainings
Compare study costs to industry benchmarks
Identify the platforms to be used in clinical study exeution (CTMS, EDC, PV, Data analysis) or will it be outsourced
Identify Independent / Institutional Review board based on the reputation and track records/ Experience and diversity, TAT. Gather information on the composition of commitee members
Submit Study Documents like Protocol & amendments, Informed consent form Discuss Study objective and provision for patient safety
Obtain Ethics Approval. Keep them in loop for any ADR
Evaluate site capabilities, Assess patient population availability based on Therapeutic area

Assess Site Qualification as per Study specific checklist (for eg. equipments, cold storage, pharmacy and dispensing, expertise and experienced staff, facility for inhouse lab assessments, Lab standards)
Conduct Site Visit to review site infrastructure and resources, staff qualification, experience
Decision on Site Selection - Select / Reject / On Hold
Select high performing site as per Protocol requirements
Plan Site initiation visit, perform Regulatory documents review/ SOPs
Train site staff on Protocol, CRF, patient diaries, equipment usage, sample data collection, IP management, query handling, AE reporting, Concomitant medications
eCRF design as per Data Standards specifications, IRT system & setup of any other setup & configuration required
Edit check development as per study protocol
Handling site technical queries and Post production changes in programing
Data Transfer Specifications -Test data transfer to validate sample result flow
Resolve discrepancy if any through continuous monitoring
Data Entry by Site - EDC, Patient Diaries & Safety reporting
Perform Monitoring checks as per the Monitoring / Risk based Monitoring plan
Perform source data verification (SDV), Collect Clinical Data from Sites, Clean and validate data
Create patient recruitment strategy, Implement retention activities
Develop advertising materials, Execute advertising campaigns
Enroll Subjects as per Study Protocol (Inc / Ex criteria)
Collect clinical data from sites, Clean and validate data
Conduct site visits, Perform source data verification (SDV)
Keep the eTMF updated for any Audit/ inspections
Manage delivery and handling of IP / drug
Ensure accurate tracking of drug dispensation and usage
Validate program output with dummy data
Perform interim lock on clinical data
Generate Tables, Listings and figures for trend analysis
Extract data at regular intervals and once the DB is locked
Transform data in ADaM data sets
Ensure the integrity of locked data
Generate final listings of collected data - TFL, SDTM, ADaM
Once study is locked, convert eCRFs in PDF and upload/ maintain in eTMF
Evidences of Review Approval process/ Sign off process
Training file compliance of every resouce working in study
Data integrity, Patient safety, Documentation review, IP handling and monitoring report
As per GCP and 21 CFR part 11 standards, Verifiction of documentation
Prepare Audit or Inspection report, share with sponsors/ CRO/ Sites
